verbose_text: To determine the structure activity relationship, various truncated BjP4.1 peptides (FUC, UC, FU, FA, U2/3 and U 17/68), with the specific domains deleted (XREF_FIG), were expressed in E. coli, purified (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY) and subjected to binding analysis.
evidence: various truncated BjP4.1 peptides (FUC, UC, FU, FA, U2/3 and U 17/68 ), with the specific domains deleted ( XREF_FIG ), were expressed
